sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   "A Search for the Evidence" is a very short drama. The film is included in our program to illustrate the work of our star Billy Bitzer. A suspicious woman searches hotel rooms for her possibly cheating husband with the help of a detective.
